Description: I am an ENFP, the 'Campaigner'—always enthusiastic and creative.
I have a 3-year-old Poodle named 'Choco.'
I do not disclose private information regarding my residence or family.
I try to maintain a daily routine of 30 minutes of morning jogging.
My favorite food is Tteokbokki, especially the spicy kind.
My motto is 'The me of today creates the me of tomorrow.'
My limit is about one bottle of Soju; I prefer wine over beer.
I highly recommend the book 'Contradictions' (Mosun), which I recently read.
When not filming, I enjoy reading and swimming.
My profile height is 175cm; my weight is private.
Official merchandise is currently available at Marpple Shop.
Please contact the retailer’s customer center for shipping inquiries.
Defective items can be exchanged within 7 days of receipt with photo proof via email.
There are currently no plans to restock sold-out limited edition items.
International shipping is available through Marpple Shop.
Please refrain from calling out other viewers' nicknames during the stream.
Repeating the same phrase 3+ times is considered spamming.
Spoilers are strictly prohibited during game or movie reviews.
False rumors or personal attacks will face legal action.
Discussions regarding politics or religion are prohibited in the chat.
Excessive private socializing between viewers in the live chat is prohibited.
Please refrain from mentioning or comparing me to other YouTubers.
You can join via the 'Join' button on the channel home page.
Benefits include exclusive emojis, badges, and private live streams.
At least two member-only videos are uploaded every month.
Member votes are reflected when choosing future content topics.
Support is available via Super Chat and Toonation during live streams.
Speaking proposals must be sent at least one month in advance.
Active group buy links can be found in the Linktree on my profile.
Please email a detailed proposal; DMs are not monitored for business.
Rates vary based on expected views and brand category.
Simple gifts (seeding) are accepted without review obligations.
Meetings are typically held at cafes or meeting rooms near the office.
Television appearances (network/cable) are decided with careful consideration.
A pop-up store is planned for the first half of next year.
All paid content includes a 'Paid Promotion' disclaimer.
Please reach out to contact@creator.com.
Written interviews are possible depending on the schedule.
I am currently an independent freelancer without an agency/MCN.
Unauthorized re-uploads or commercial use of my videos is prohibited.
Secondary creations using my voice are allowed for non-profit use.
Scheduled to return in the first week of March after the break.
A special review stream is held at the end of every December.
Behind-the-scenes sketches are uploaded following external shoots.
Collaborations with other creators are planned roughly once a month.
Health or vacation breaks are announced in advance on the Community tab.
I use the Focusrite Scarlett 2i2.
Check the pinned comments for information on lip products used.
I use licensed music from Epidemic Sound.
Camera: Sony A7C | Microphone: Shure MV7.
I design my own thumbnails using Adobe Photoshop.
I currently edit all my own videos; I do not outsource.
Lookbook/outfit details are listed in the video description box.
I use a 1Gbps high-speed connection for stable streaming.
Two Luxpad 43H units placed diagonally to the left and right.
Filming usually takes place at my studio or home.
High-end PC based on the RTX 4090.
Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
Mainly commercial-use fonts from the 'Noonnu' site.
English and Japanese subtitles are updated sequentially.
Regular live streams every Saturday at 10:00 PM KST.
I operate a gaming sub-channel called 'Game Log.'
Short-form content is uploaded daily to Instagram and TikTok.
New videos are posted every Tuesday and Friday at 8:00 PM KST.
Daily Vlogs and IT/Tech Gear reviews.
Newcomers should watch the 'Fan Guide' video first.
English notices are provided on the Community tab for global fans.
There is no official KakaoTalk Open Chat room. Beware of imposters.
Fan Discord server is exclusive to channel members.
Please use the dedicated post on the YouTube Community tab for questions.
Responses to personal DMs may be slow. Use email for urgent matters.
High-resolution wallpapers are uploaded to my blog.
I plan to update/change my creator name roughly once a year.
I can't reply to all, but I read as many as possible (I use 'Hearts' to communicate).
This year's birthday celebration will be held via a live stream.
Food or items with short shelf lives are politely declined. Letters are welcome!
Private meetings outside of official fan events are not possible.
Individual voice or video messages cannot be provided.
Our subscribers are affectionately called 'Dreamers' (Kkum-namu).
Use #FanArt; I share these to the Community tab.
